message.body: You know, back in the day they had these things called cameras that took pictures
Yeah, and when I feel like spending $150-300, I might get one
Eh, I got one for $40
I'm so pleased for you.
Mmhmm
Most of the time I just use the one on my phone, because its just as good in many ways
Yep
Also don't have a smart phone
and it's nice not to have to lug around 3 different things
MP3 player, phone, camera
I bet it's awesome being able to state the obvious and still feel like you're sharing interesting information.
you'd be surprised how many people still do that
out of habit, I would presume
also, you must get an extreme amount of gratification dissenting everything I say
I feel like we would get along a lot better if you didn't talk to me like I'm incapable of complex thinking and ignorant.
I feel like we would get along better if you didn't take everything that I say as some sort of insult of your intelligence
I don't take it as an insult to my intelligence
I take it as you being a douche and I respond in kind
well stop taking it as me being a douche, because then you're being a douche
The difference between us here is that I don't care if I'm being an asshole
oh, and I do?
You're the one that keeps bitching about it.
the difference here is I have no intention of being an asshole
Bitch about me dissenting, bitch about me taking it personally.
Andres, there is simply no way to determine when you are and are not intending to be an ass
dude, you are the one bitching about me stating the obvious
I didn't bitch
what part of me stating the obvious is insulting to you?
I said it must be nice to have a superiority complex that strong
because clearly I am incapable of insulting your intelligence
You can try.
You can form insulting phrases.
I'm sorry I am incapable of talking to you in the manner which you would prefer
I'm not even talking with you about this right now.
Yeah, me too.
You're so funny.
I'd prefer if you didn't constantly get on my case about how I talk to you is 'like you're incapable of complex thinking'
do you consider yourself a control freak?
Act/talk like you're so much better, smarter, more informed than everyone else, and get all bent out of shape when I don't just let it go like everyone else does
said the pot to the kettle
I don't get bent out of shape when people call me on it
If I told you that smart phones were awesome because they took the place of three separate electronics, you wouldn't just be like "Yeah, you're right."
You'd respond sarcastically in some fashion.
perhaps
but not likely
Undoubtedly.
Whatever
well try it sometime

Liz: I bet it's awesome being able to state the obvious and still feel like you're sharing interesting information. Sent at 3:12 PM on Saturday me: you'd be surprised how many people still do that out of habit, I would presume Sent at 3:15 PM on Saturday me: also, you must get an extreme amount of gratification dissenting everything I say
my original response to that was not some sarcastic come back
Do _what_ out of habit?
Carry a ton of electronics?
Who the fuck cares?
Am I most people?
I'm just making an observation
Mmhm
I need to go.
sorry your superior intellect does not find it interesting enough
aside: I find that you are a bit worked up at me about something lately
